title: pArvatIshvarENa
sahitya:
pArvatIshvarENa rakSitOham paramArtha tatvabOdhita shivEna


anupallavi

 parvata rAjAtmjA ramaNEna bhakta janAvana guruguhanutEna


caraNam   gangAdharEshvarENa varENa gandharva sEvita padAmbujEna 
sUrya candrAgni nayana vilAsEna kArya kAraNAtmaka prvrttEna 
pankajAsanAdy-arccita padEna parama shAnta svarUpAtmakEna 
sankaTa haraNEna sadAshivEna nitya shuddha buddha muktEna shrI
